innhold.avsnitt: You can take the paternal quota from week 7 after the birth or wait until the child is a bit bigger. You can take the weeks together, divide these up or combine them with partial work.
You must take the paternity quota before the joint period is over, or apply for a postponement.
If you adopt, you can take the paternal quota at any time following omsorgsovertakelsen.
If you get so sick that you are completely dependent on assistance for taking care of the child, the mother can apply to take over your paternal quota.
Read more about the entire application process.
